name: BrainWash
description:
a top-down bullet hell where you cast a mind-controlling spell on skeletons to kill others

made in 48 hours for the 5th Alakajam

im really sorry if its all a buggy mess i sort of rushed it all. i will definitely be updating this!

controls:

-WASD / Arrow Keys for movement

-K to Mind Control one skeleton in the radius around you
